name: eka-config
description: Syncing for some of my workspace config files
author: Erik Björn <erik.g.bjoern@gmail.com>

scripts.eka: chmod ug+x $PWD/scripts.sh && chmod ug+x $PWD/helpers.sh && PREFIX= $PWD/scripts.sh && git config --global user.name 'Erik Björn' && git config --global user.email erik.g.bjoern@gmail.com
